question: Which country has test-fired surface-to-surface cruise missile named ‘Babar’?
explanation:
Pakistan recently conducted a successful test-firing of a surface-to-surface cruise missile named ‘Babar’, which can strike targets up to 450 kilometres.
Pakistan Navy is also organising a multilateral maritime Exercise Aman, which is being participated by as many as 46 countries including US, China, Russia, UK, Turkey, Iran, Indonesia.
